column5: I am gonna try and get into fly fishing, I bought a phlueger reel and would like some suggestions for line to use.  it is a 5/6 weight rod I am using.  I am using it for small trout mostly.  Thanks for any help!
http://www.cortlandline.com/catalog/555lines.html  I fly fish a little.  Have this line on my 6wt and 9wt and don't mind it much at all.
